Title: ACCA: 13-ku Kansatsu-ka Specials
Description: ['Short specials of ', ACCA: 13-ku Kansatsu-ka, ' included on the three BD Box Sets.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The first episode focuses on Jean and Lotta where Lotta reflects how Jean is very forgetful day-to-day yet remembers the most important things.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The second episode focuses on Nino and Jean out drinking at a bar. Nino pokes at Jean for not having any friends outside of himself and Lotta. The conversation then steers toward women.']
